code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import*as dayjs from"dayjs";import{TableCell,TableBody,TableRow}from"@windmill/react-ui";import Status from"../table/Status";import{FiZoomIn}from"react-icons/fi";import Tooltip from"../tooltip/Tooltip";import SelectStatus from"../form/SelectStatus";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderTable=_ref=>{let{orders}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:orders===null||orders===void 0?void 0:orders.map((order,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:dayjs(order.createdAt).format("MMM D, YYYY")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:order.customerId.firstName})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[" ","$",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:order.servicefee})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm font-semibold",children:["$",Math.round(order.totalCost),".00"]})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{className:"text-center text-xs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{status:order.status})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SelectStatus,{id:order._id,order:order})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{className:"text-right flex justify-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-2 cursor-pointer text-gray-400 hover:text-green-600",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/order/${order._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{id:"view",Icon:FiZoomIn,title:"View Invoice",bgColor:"#34D399"})})]})})]},i+1))})});};export default OrderTable;
